website_summaries.verdict: A stylish women's packable jacket that's well insulated and comes with its own packable pouch.
cons: This jacket tends to run small
Down feathers shed from the coat

customer_reviews.title: the jacket sheds down like crazy. Whatever clothes I am wearing have white ...
customer_reviews.text: I got excited about this jacket when I ordered it. It had the style and shape that I wanted at a very affordable price. Unfortunately, the jacket sheds down like crazy. Whatever clothes I am wearing have white feathers on them when I remove the jacket. My car seat has feathers all over it too when I've worn it in the car. I expect some shedding, but not this much.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bell Roden

customer_reviews.title: This little jacket really surprised me!!
customer_reviews.text: When I received the jacket, I immediately thought it was much too thin to ever be warm enough. I was actually going to return it. I decided to try it and to my surprise, for a jacket that is so lightweight---it is warm. It won't work on a day below 20 degrees, but it's perfect for a November day. I'm glad I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Banks

customer_reviews.title: Terrible zipper
customer_reviews.text: Really cheap material. The zip is really flimsy and does that annoying thing where it starts to come undone from the bottom .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coat
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sister who absolutely lives the fit, weight and color. It is her take along on all travel trips for the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Very light and comfy. It's not for a snow storm, but great in California for low 50s, or 40s with a warm sweater underneath. It's roomy enough for a sweater and the inside is not fleece which makes on/off easy!
customer_reviews.author: Val Turquoise

customer_reviews.title: Neon Color
customer_reviews.text: This jacket fit beautifully and quality was great. However, I missed reading the color description. It is definitely "neon".
customer_reviews.author: Sarita

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty
customer_reviews.text: It's clean and fresh looking and it runs a little small but I really like this coat.
customer_reviews.author: susan weber

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: I loved this...but it was too small no med available
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: It's really NEON!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the color on the screen, but my cell phone photo shows it close to the color shown. It is bright orange, neon enough that I will be easy to find in a crowd. I'm not an exhibitionist, but it's so cute and fits so well, I'm going to keep it. (At a store, I never would have bought it.)
customer_reviews.author: Karen Smith

customer_reviews.title: It fits well and looks nice. It is not heavy or bulky
customer_reviews.text: It fits well and looks nice. It is not heavy or bulky, maybe too light for a really cold day.
customer_reviews.author: Gal-on-the-run

customer_reviews.title: The fit is great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat. I am 5 ft 4 inches tall and weigh 119 lbs and the Small fits perfectly. It is very lightweight and perfect for summer wear in the mountains or by the beach. It is not boxy which I like and the feathers do not show through the white fabric. It is a great jacket for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and super cute
customer_reviews.text: Easy to pack, washes up well. Not suitable for really cold weather but nice, lightweight and comfortable. Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice and warm for winter days. I like the color and design
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Franco

customer_reviews.title: Just okay !
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and sheds especially noticeable when I wear black. Ok for moderately cold days.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Easy travel jacket
customer_reviews.text: I'm taking this on a trip to Norway so haven't worn it yet. I love the way it packs into its little bag and comes out unwrinkled.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Received a jacket that was not what was described or ...
customer_reviews.text: Received a jacket that was not what was described or depicted. The following was what was different: manufacturer, the stitching pattern, the fabric/filling, the collar was not a zipper all the way up (smaller collar which included two snaps) And no storage bag included. I returned it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too many little threads hanging off. Otherwise it was just right.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great product for travelers
customer_reviews.text: Light, warm, packs super small - Great product for travelers
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: This is a great coat when the temperatures are around 40-50's
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coat when the temperatures are around 40-50's. Works well when there is light rain as well. I saw some of the comments and ordered an L(I usually wear a medium), but it seems to be a little oversized. I think it fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tejaswi K.

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for me. Not too tight and warm enough for southern CA weather.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Nice, light weight jacket
customer_reviews.text: It is thin and the fabric is soft. It will fold up and fit in a small pouch to carry with you. The color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Dalmom

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Took this coat on a trip to KY. Lightweight, but warm. Packed nicely in the pouch for indoor walking around which was nicer that carrying a bulky coat.
customer_reviews.author: DHall

customer_reviews.title: Loose feathers and threads
customer_reviews.text: Really cheap material. Lots of loose threads and feathers coming out of the seams. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket. Very lightweight. Good only for winters in the southwest. Soft fabric. Nice fit. True to size
customer_reviews.author: isla girl

customer_reviews.title: It fits like I'd expect a large to fit
customer_reviews.text: I decided to order a size up (L instead of M) so that it would be more flexible to wear over bulkier sweaters etc. It fits like I'd expect a large to fit, I do think it runs pretty true to size. It's really cute, although some of the construction is slightly on the cheap side (nothing major). I haven't tried washing it yet, but it's great for travel and also in the summer I'll throw it in my convertible's trunk to use in an emergency. The only major downside is the sleeves are a little short.
customer_reviews.author: Mira Krishnan

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good quality, true to description.
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far, I haven't gotten to wear it more than once so I haven't tried it out on a really cold day but it is soft, packable and the color is really nice in person.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Light wait & easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: Light wait & easy to pack. Great little jacket for cold weather in Southern States. Love the fit as it is not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Myers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase. Love the color and its warm!
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Clemons

customer_reviews.title: I just want to exchange it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the jacket I want to exchange it for a size large.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Willis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Color a bit too bright. Didn't seem that neon on the picture
customer_reviews.author: maria anderson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend it. I was hesitant when I received it ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely recommend it. I was hesitant when I received it but was extremely surprised with how warm it could keep me with a light long sleeve shirt underneath at 39-48 temperatures. Great buy. Super convenient with weight and that it can be folded so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Valencia

customer_reviews.title: I think this will be too small for my Daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this will be too small for my Daughter. It was to be a Christmas gift so I will have to wait until then to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Marcum

customer_reviews.title: Favorite jacket
customer_reviews.text: I wear this jacket almost every day, living in a chilly house & hating to be cold. It is great for wearing under heavier layers because it is so light. It washes incredibly well. I've given 3 away as gifts, because everyone wants it. My only complaint is that the zipper on my favorite, green jacket is beginning to go, I will buy another green one as backup.
customer_reviews.author: barndweller

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lightweight coat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat! Its a relatively lightweight coat so I wouldn’t wear it for a day of snow activity outside. But I use it for everyday winter wear when I’m running errands. I usually wear sweaters or sweatshirts underneath so it’s perfect for layering. I’m 5’3” and 125lbs and a small fits perfect. I also love that it comes with a cinch sack to stuff it into, so nice for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: mindy

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This shouldn’t even have a label of jacket. It feels like a cheap trash bag made to look like a jacket. It’s practically see through. Not even a jacket. Don’t waste your money on this cheap trash bag called jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Loved the jacket, the fit, and color, but the feathers flew and stuck everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is lightweight, fits great, has zippered pockets and the two colors I ordered were very nice. I had to send the jackets back, though, because the duck feathers that are the fill flew out all over the place and stuck to my jersey shirts and sweaters. It's too bad because I liked so many things about the jacket, but I just couldn't be covered in feathers all the time. I wish the workmanship were better. It would be a terrible choice for anyone with allergies.
customer_reviews.author: crmcinerney

customer_reviews.title: Color little off!
customer_reviews.text: The color is more of a neon pink not like the pic. Other then that very light weight jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Ceciliasmith

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is super light-weight and soft. I haven’t tested it in cold temps but I suspect it wouldn’t be any good in sub-40 temperatures. I ordered Nightshade and thought I was getting Black but it’s actually a dark navy. It’s pretty and a nice change for me. I got an XL and probably wouldn’t be able to wear anything thicker than a T-shirt or light sweater under it, so if you like to layer, you’ll probably want to size up.
customer_reviews.author: Joe muscara

customer_reviews.title: Good for cool not cold.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and very cute on my wife. Not for cold weather but good for a cool night, say 55+ degrees. She really likes it!
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. I almost live in it. Light weight, comfortable. I’ve actually had three of them. Lost one, don’t know how that happened, and had to get two more (just in case!)
customer_reviews.author: PickyPixie

customer_reviews.title: Quality bad
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the products very bad. The color doesn’t match the picture. Not recommend
customer_reviews.author: janie

customer_reviews.title: Fit right, arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket. If only it had a hood, as the picture, with a zipper at the collar, seemed to indicate.
customer_reviews.author: Delliegs

product_meta.title: XPOSURZONE Women Packable Down Quilted Jacket Lightweight Puffer Coat
product_meta.description:
XPOSURZONE Women Packable Down Quilted Jacket Lightweight Puffer Coat

About XPOSURZONE 
XPOSURZONE is a professional manufacturer of cold weather outwear, especially ultralight down jackets. We produce a wide range of jackets, vests, blankets, and other cold weather apparel, using the best quality, highest performing materials. Our premium down is incredibly lofty, weighs practically nothing, and amazingly compressible.

Product Details 
This down jacket is thin and light, yet incredibly warm. The innovative shell material is densely woven to keep rain out. A high, fitted collar plus elastic cuffs help keep drafts out. Slightly nipped in waist creates a visual slimming effect. Elastic band binding at bottom hem seals out cold and wind. Quilt-through design reduces pack size. Pack it compactly into the included carrying pouch, so you can take it with you wherever you go. It's suitable for outdoor and sportswear: golf, hiking, climbing, traveling, riding, driving, walking, casual and other sports


Detail Sizing information(inch): 
SIZE XS:Shoulder(15.00)Chest(37)Sleeve(32.0)Bottom(38)Length(23.5) 
SIZE S :Shoulder(15.50)Chest(39)Sleeve(32.5)Bottom(40)Length(24) 
SIZE M :Shoulder(16.00)Chest(41)Sleeve(33.0)Bottom(42)Length(24.5) 
SIZE L :Shoulder(16.75)Chest(44)Sleeve(33.5)Bottom(45)Length(25) 
SIZE XL:Shoulder(17.50)Chest(47)Sleeve(34.0)Bottom(48)Length(25.5) 
Attention: 
Size Disclaimer : 
Our size is in US version.While the size is measured by hands, so please understand that there might exist a little bit unavoidable mistake.It is better to check the size chart below to choose the most suitable size according to your own detail measurements: shoulder,chest,sleeve,length. 
Color Disclaimer: 
As different computers display colors differently,the color of the actual item may vary slightly from the above images.
feature_bullets: Color-matched packable pouth inclued,easy to carry
Classic scoop neck design and ultra thin design,suitable for dressing undercoat; On-seamside-entry zipper pockets with flap
Ultralight down vest featuring 92% Duck Down square quilting and snaps closure
Lightweight and warm-keeping, XPOSURZONE down vest is suitable for outdoor and sports wear:golf,hiking,climbing,traveling,riding,driving,walking,casual and other sports
